Author: zemaj
Content:
Sounds perfect - thanks.

Presumably after several hours you could discount the votes altogether since they would have such a little influence on the final result. That would stop the system getting bogged down over time.

Out of interest, what is your "and so on". Do you go to 0.5 for the next 2 hours?

Author: danw
Title: Tip: Don't Ever, Not Reply to a Sales Inquiry

Author: Tichy
Content: Do you think it would be better to turn the whole thing into a competition, like "who writes the best file upload within 48 hours"?
